about_the_game:
Lichtreich Universe


✬✬✬✬✬
Lichtreich. The only island where mutants can live peacefully among people. Fear which ordinary people abroad feel forces mutants to find a better place. There are only few mutants, most of them are from military, other are result of the experiments and abductions. Most of them have special magical skills and the most dangerous are - Yokai. Only fraction of mutants can be called Yokai, They're at the top of hierarchy. My father was one of them, that's why he became detective. He did that to help all the people and mutants on the island. I want to be just like him - to be able to change the world! Unfortunately, he died on my hands while saving lives. I have a dream to be just like him, so I followed his footsteps. My name is Alex and I'm detective on the Lichtreich island!

About Game


✬✬✬✬✬
2D horror game with strong story focus. As a detective which dealt the most with infamous "Viper", Alex is the best choice to check his mansion. You have to find out if there any people alive? There is no time to waste, you have to check it!

This game highly emphatises with careful exploration. You have to be sure to make your choices wise. All of your steps in the game matter.

Features

✬✬✬✬✬

  • Unique story! Lichtreich island story told for the first time!
  • Your choices matter! Game story adjust to your choices!
  • Test your skills! Complete quests wisely with help of you in game log!
  • Challenge yourself! QTE, mysteries and challenges waits for you in the mansion!

content_descriptors.notes: Exorcism, mutation, kidnapping, death, suicide, blood.

short_description: Detective Alex got the case to check Viper mansion. When her owner was alive he kept there ordinary people to mutate them. Can you find out how many alive people you can find? Be sure to check every corner!
